Package com.bakdata.dedupe.fusion

Interface Fusion<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the record
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConflictResolutionFusion
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Fusion<T>
    Fuses a cluster of duplicates to one representation.

    Fusion may be incomplete in which case FusedValue signals possible issues. The fusion should work fail-late: It should try to resolve as many information as possible and collect all issues on the way.

    There is no distinction between fusion in an online and offline process.

      • fusedValue

        @NonNull
default @NonNull java.util.Optional<T> fusedValue​(@NonNull
                                                  @NonNull Cluster<?,​T> cluster,
                                                  @NonNull
                                                  @NonNull IncompleteFusionHandler<T> incompleteFusionHandler)
        Returns the fused value for a cluster of duplicates. If fusion is not successful, a second try with the IncompleteFusionHandler is performed. If that try fails as well, Optional.empty() is returned.
        Parameters:
        cluster - a cluster of duplicates.
        incompleteFusionHandler - tries to complete an incomplete fusion.
        Returns:
        a complete fusion value or Optional.empty().
